thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Ms Emma Byrne
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Ms Emma Byrne

author: Ms Emma Byrne
title: Ms Emma Byrne
text: I was trying to replace a pair of runners I'd gotten a log of mileage out of (previously bought in Lifestyle on Grafton st), and couldn't find anything suitable in any of the sportswear stores in my area. I decided to have a quick look on lifestylesports.com and found the exact pair I'd bought before (in a different colour). Popped them in my shopping cart, along with a nifty little pair of everyday runners. Ordered them on my couch at 7pm on a Sunday night and they were on my desk at work by lunchtime the next day. Having spent ages traipsing through the stores, I should have just gone straight to the site! Great service, great selection, and great prices!
